Instrument.ProBass_22Fret: ２２フレットプロベースギター

SortAttribute.ProBass_22: ２２フレットプロベースギター

Song.Engineered: レコーディングエンジニア

We stand on the shoulders of giants.

Toast.UnsupportedDevice: Automatic profile creation is not supported for {0}!

AntiPiracy.Title: YARGの著作権侵害声明
AntiPiracy.Description: YARG stands firmly against all forms of piracy. We neither support nor endorse piracy, as it is a violation of copyright law with serious legal consequences. Our platform's importable content—designed for creators to share their work and for educational purposes—does not justify or excuse piracy. YARG itself does not use any ripped/pirated assets or music and never will. By using YARG, users agree not to promote or endorse piracy in any way through our platform. Upholding these principles ensures a community that respects copyright, creativity, and legal standards. YARG stands for "Yet Another Rhythm Game" and NOT for pirates.

BadSongs.Title: 数曲をスキャンでできませんでした
BadSongs.Description: One or more of the songs you scanned were corrupted, formatted incorrectly, or encrypted, and could not be loaded into the game. For more info, please check the file located at "{0}".

ConfirmDelete.Title: 「{0}」を削除する？
ConfirmDelete.Message: 本当に{0}を削除しますか？ {1}
ConfirmDelete.Confirm: ここに{0}入力して確認します

EngineInconsistency.Title: リプレイはベータ版です
EngineInconsistency.Description: 只今、リプレーシステムはベータにあるのせいで違うスコアとスタットを表示するの可能性があるんだけど、特にギターだったらです。 目的は信頼的と正確があります。問題を直しています！

Experimental.Title: 実験的な機能の知らせ
Experimental.Description: 表示されようとしているオプションは進行中です。この機能は変更される可能性がある、バグがあるかもしれない、そして<b>重大な問題を引き起こすかもしれません<b>。

DifficultySelect.WarningPlayerNoInputDevice: このプレイヤーは充てた入力デバイスがありません！プロフィールメニューで充ててください。
DifficultySelect.WarningVocalistNoMicrophone: このボーカリストは充てたマイクがありません！プロフィールメニューで充ててください。

Main.MessageOfTheDay: Welcome to v0.14! v0.14 is a major update that adds 5 Lane Keys, a new MIDI Drums profile type, easier instrument setup, support for 3D venue events, performance improvements when using multiple highways, many visual improvements, and more. If you have any feedback or find any bugs, please let us know on Discord or GitHub. Happy YARGin'!

MusicLibrary.Name: 音楽ライブラリ
MusicLibrary.NoSongsMatchCriteria: 検測条件は曲がありません

Item.AddToPlaylist: プレイリストに付け加える
Item.RemoveFromPlaylist: プレイリストから削除
Item.CopySongChecksum: 曲のチェックサムをコピー

MusicLibrary.NoPlayersConnected: プレイヤは接続していません！　プロファイルのメニューでプレイヤを接続できます。
MusicLibrary.AddToSet: セットリストに追加する
MusicLibrary.AddedToSet: セットリストに追加しました
MusicLibrary.PlaylistAddedToSet: プレイリストからセットリストまで{0:N0}曲歌を追加しました
MusicLibrary.StartSet: セットリストを始める
MusicLibrary.NoSongsInPlaylist: プレイリストから曲歌がありません
MusicLibrary.CannotAddToSelf: いや、ウロボロスをつくてくれない。惜しいね、ジェイデン。
MusicLibrary.AddedToShow: ショーに追加しました

Settings.DMXInfo: DMX cue change and post-processing channel values: Cue Change: 0 - No cue 10 - Menu 20 - Score 30 - Intro 40 - Verse 50 - Chorus 60 - Cool (loop) 70 - Warm (loop) 80 - Cool (manual) 90 - Warm (manual) 100 - Dischord 110 - Stomp 120 - Default 130 - Harmony 140 - Frenzy 150 - Silhouettes 160 - Silhouettes Spotlight 170 - Searchlights 180 - Sweep 190 - Blackout (fast) 200 - Blackout (slow) 210 - Blackout (spotlight) 220 - Flare (slow) 230 - Flare (fast) 240 - Big Rock Ending For Strobe and Fog status listen to their respective channels. Post-Processing: 0 - Default Basic effects 4 - Bloom 14 - Bright 24 - Contrast 34 - Mirror 44 - PhotoNegative 54 - Posterize Color filters/effects 64 - Black And White 74 - Sepia Tone 84 - Silver Tone 94 - Choppy Black And White 104 - Photo Negative Red And Black 114 - Polarized Black And White 124 - Polarized Red And Blue 134 - Desaturated Red 144 - Desaturated Blue 154 - Contrast Red 164 - Contrast Green 174 - Contrast Blue Grainy 184 - Grainy Film 194 - Grainy Chromatic Abberation Scanlines 204 - Scanlines 214 - Scanlines Black And White 224 - Scanlines Blue 234 - Scanlines Security Trails 244 - Trails 252 - Trails Long 253 - Trails Desaturated 254 - Trails Flickery 255 - Trails Spacey See YARG docs for more information: https://docs.yarg.in/en/DMX

この設定は仕掛品です。変更される可能性がある。オンにしたら、バグがあるかもしれない、重大な問題を発生させるかもしれない。

LargeText.Nightly: Yet Another Rhythm Game（ナイトリー）

Menu.Yellow: イエロー（ショートカット1）

Menu.Orange: オレンジ（ショートカット3）

FiveFret.SoloOrange: ソロオレンジフレット

EliteDrums.Stomp: ハイハットペダル踏み
EliteDrums.Splash: ハイハットペダルスプラッシュ

EliteDrums.RightCrash: 右クラッシュシンバル

FiveDrums.OrangeCymbal: オレンジのシンバル（第四）

Header.Customization: バッファカスタマイズ

Button.CopyCurrentSongJsonFilePath: 現在の曲のJSONファイルパスをコピー
Button.CopyCurrentSongTextFilePath: 現在の曲のテキストパスをコピー
Button.OpenCalibrator: 自動でキャリブレーション
Button.OpenVenueFolder: 背景とベニューのフォルダを開く
Button.OpenExecutablePath: 実行ファイルパスを開く
Button.OpenPersistentDataPath: 永続データのパスを開く

AllowDuplicateSongs.Name: 重複曲を許可
AllowDuplicateSongs.Description:
重複曲をスキャンしてライブラリに表示することを許可します
<color=white>変更すると、スキャンがまた所要です！</color>

AudioCalibration.Name: オーディオキャリブレーション（ミリ秒）
AudioCalibration.Description: Audio calibration in milliseconds. Use the calibrator to automatically calibrate. Higher values make the audio play earlier, while lower ones make the audio play later.

AccountForHardwareLatency.Name: Account For Audio Hardware Latency
AccountForHardwareLatency.Description: Automatically accounts for the detected playback latency of your audio hardware. This latency may be inaccurate, disable this setting if your audio calibration is negative.

BassVolume.Name: ベースボリューム
BassVolume.Description: 曲のギタートラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

CountdownDisplay.Name: カウントダウンの表示方
CountdownDisplay.Description: 曲の長い休憩時間にカウントダウンを表示する方法を選択します。

OverstrumAndOverhitSoundEffects.Name: オーバーストラムとオーバーヒットのSE
OverstrumAndOverhitSoundEffects.Description: オーバーストラムとオーバーヒットのSEをオンにします。

AlwaysOnDrumSFX.Name: 常にドラムSE
AlwaysOnDrumSFX.Description: 常にドラムSEをオンにします。

BandComboTypeSetting.Name: バンドコンボ種類
BandComboTypeSetting.Description: Adjusts how Band Streak is calculated, especially in multiplayer sessions. Set this to 'Off' to hide the Band Streak counter.

CrowdVolume.Name: 観客ボリューム
CrowdVolume.Description: 曲の観客トラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

DifficultyRings.Name: 難度リングモード
DifficultyRings.Description: How to display intensity values on the difficulty rings in the music library.

DisableBloom.Name: ブルームをオフにする
DisableBloom.Description: Disables post-processing bloom (the glowly effect). May increase performance.

DisableFilmGrain.Name: 粒状性をオフにする
DisableFilmGrain.Description: ポストプロセッシング粒状性エフェクトをオフにされます。GPU負荷を下げることができます。

DisableDefaultBackground.Name: デフォルト背景をオフにする
DisableDefaultBackground.Description: Disables the default background, allowing you to see a professional black background if no other backgrounds are available.

DisableGlobalBackgrounds.Name: 一般背景をオフにする
DisableGlobalBackgrounds.Description: Disables custom backgrounds from your venue folder, allowing the default background to be used if there is no per-song background.

DisablePerSongBackgrounds.Name: Disable Per-Song Backgrounds
DisablePerSongBackgrounds.Description: 曲のカスタムの背景を無効にして、ベニューフォルダにある背景を表示します。

DisableTextNotifications.Name: テキスト通知をオフにする
DisableTextNotifications.Description: 「１００コンボ」とか「フルコンボ」とかテキスト通知を無効にします。

DiscordRichPresence.Name: Discordのアクティビティステータス
DiscordRichPresence.Description: Discordのアクティビティステータスがどのように表示されるか選びます。

Dropdown.Limited: Show without the currently playing song

DMXBlueChannels.Name: DMXブルー
DMXBlueChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight blue LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXCueChangeChannel.Name: DMXキューチェンジ
DMXCueChangeChannel.Description: This channel's value will change whenever the lighting cue changes. See the values below:

DMXDimmerChannels.Name: DMXマスターディマー
DMXDimmerChannels.Description: Channels listed here will be set on game start. Default value is max (255), can be changed in 'DMX Master Dimmer Values' setting below. Useful for fixtures that have a master dimmer channel.

DMXEnabled.Name: DMX出力をオンにする
DMXEnabled.Description: Enable sending sACN (DMX-over-ethernet) packets over the network to universe 1. Adds 250k bps to network traffic.

DMXFogChannels.Name: DMX霧
DMXFogChannels.Description: Each channel set here will receive the StageKit fog on (255) and fog off (0).

DMXGreenChannels.Name: DMXグリン
DMXGreenChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight green LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXRedChannels.Name: DMXレッド
DMXRedChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight red LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DMXStrobeChannels.Name: DMXストロボライト
DMXStrobeChannels.Description: Each channel set here will receive StageKit strobe commands, either off (0), slow (64), medium (127), fast (191), fastest (255).

DMXYellowChannels.Name: DMXイエロー
DMXYellowChannels.Description: The eight channels here represent the eight yellow LEDs of the StageKit. They will receive on (255) and off (0) commands.

DrumsVolume.Name: ドラムのボリューム
DrumsVolume.Description: 曲のドラムトラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

DrumSfxVolume.Name: ドラムのSEボリューム
DrumSfxVolume.Description: Adjusts the drum hit sound effect volume, which can be triggered before the first note, after the last note, or during drum fills/BREs.

EnablePracticeSP.Name: 練習でスターパワー
EnablePracticeSP.Description: 練習でスターパワーフレーズを許可します。

FpsCap.Name: フレームレートの制限
FpsCap.Description: フレームレートの制限です。 <color=white>1000FPSでプレイするのは必要じゃないです。</color> VSyncをお勧めします。

FpsStats.Name: フレームレートを表示
FpsStats.Description: ステータスバーでフレームレートを表示。

FullscreenMode.Name: フルスクリーンモード
FullscreenMode.Description: フルスクリーンモードを変更します。

Dropdown.FullScreenWindow: ボーダーレスフルスクリーン

GraphicalProgressOnScoreBox.Name: Graphical Progress On Score Box
GraphicalProgressOnScoreBox.Description: Enables and disables the graphical blue outline on the score box that displays the song's progress.

GuitarVolume.Name: ギターの音量
GuitarVolume.Description: 曲のギタートラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

HighScoreInfo.Name: ハイスコア表示
HighScoreInfo.Description: Changes what high score information is displayed in the Music Library.

HighScoreHistory.Name: ハイスコア記録
HighScoreHistory.Description: Changes how score history gets used for high score information displayed in the Music Library.

HighwayTiltMultiplier.Name: Highway Tilt Multiplier
HighwayTiltMultiplier.Description: Controls the amount that the tracks should tilt inward during multiplayer gameplay only.

InputDeviceLogging.Name: 入力デバイスのログ
InputDeviceLogging.Description: Prints information about connected input devices to the game's log. Do not enable this unless you are having issues with specific devices, as it can print a very large amount of text for some devices!

InputPollingFrequency.Name: 入力の確認の頻度
InputPollingFrequency.Description: The frequency at which input devices that require polling get queried. This only applies to devices that require polling, such as XInput devices on Windows.

KeepSongInfoVisible.Name: 曲情報を隠さない
KeepSongInfoVisible.Description: 有効にすると、曲全体に曲情報が高に表示されます。無効にすると、10秒後に自動で消えます。

KeysVolume.Name: キーボードのボリューム
KeysVolume.Description: 曲のキーボードトラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

KickBounceMultiplier.Name: Drum Kick Bounce Multiplier
KickBounceMultiplier.Description: Controls the amount the track should bounce when you hit a kick note (drums only). Set to "0" if you want to disable.

LowQuality.Name: 低画質モード
LowQuality.Description: If enabled, the game will disable anti-aliasing, and use lower quality models and textures. This will significantly increase performance.

LyricDisplay.Name: 歌詞表示
LyricDisplay.Description: Choose how the lyric bar in game should be displayed.

MasterMusicVolume.Name: 音楽のマスターボリューム
MasterMusicVolume.Description: 丸ごとでボリュームを調整されます。

MinimumLogLevel.Name: Minimum Log Level
MinimumLogLevel.Description: Controls how much information is written to log files.

MicrophoneSensitivity.Name: マイクの感度（dB）
MicrophoneSensitivity.Description: デシベルでマイクの感度を変更します。低い値はもっと敏感です。

MusicPlayerVolume.Name: ミュージックプレイヤーのボリューム
MusicPlayerVolume.Description: メニューで賛成する音楽のボリュームを変更します。オフにするには０に設定する。

MuteOnMiss.Name: ミス時にミュート
MuteOnMiss.Description: Mutes a specific stem when you miss on that instrument. Only does something if the song is multi-track.

NoKicks.Name: キックなし
NoKicks.Description: すべてのキックを外します。（ドラムのみ）

NoFailMode.Name: 失敗なしモード
NoFailMode.Description: Disables ending a song early when crowd happiness is too low.

NoteStreakFrequency.Name: コンボ表示頻度
NoteStreakFrequency.Description: コンボの通知頻度をセットします。

PlayAShowTimeout.Name: Show Selection Timeout
PlayAShowTimeout.Description: The amount of time to wait for votes before picking a song or refreshing the categories.

RequireAllDifficulties.Name: すべての難易度を要求する
RequireAllDifficulties.Description: Require show songs to have at least Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert difficulties

PracticeRestartDelay.Name: 練習のリスタートの遅延
PracticeRestartDelay.Description: The amount of time (in seconds) to delay the beginning of a section in Practice Mode.

PreviewVolume.Name: プリビューのボリューム
PreviewVolume.Description: 音楽ライブラリでプリビューボリューム。

Resolution.Name: 解像度
Resolution.Description: 解像度を選びます。「デフォルト」を推奨します。

RhythmVolume.Name: リズムボリューム
RhythmVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's rhythm guitar track volume. Only does something if the song is multi-track. In some song formats, this may also be the bass guitar.

SfxVolume.Name: SEボリューム
SfxVolume.Description: Adjusts the game's sound effect volume, such as when gaining a star, or activating Star Power.

ShowAdvancedMusicLibraryOptions.Name: Show Advanced Music Library Options
ShowAdvancedMusicLibraryOptions.Description: Adds advanced settings to the "More Options" menu in the Music Library such as "View Song Folder" and "Copy Song Checksum".

ShowCursorTimer.Name: カーソルの表示時間
ShowCursorTimer.Description: How long the cursor will be shown for before hiding. Set to "0" for no hiding (playmode).

ShowFavoriteButton.Name: お気に入りボタンを表示
ShowFavoriteButton.Description: Shows and hides the favorite button in the Music Library. Songs can still be favorited in the "More Options" menu when this button is hidden.

ShowHitWindow.Name: ヒットウインドウを表示
ShowHitWindow.Description: オンにすると、トラックに判定線の表示するボックスが表示されます。

SongTimeOnScoreBox.Name: スコアボックスで再生時間を表示
SongTimeOnScoreBox.Description: Change the song time displayed above the score box. In the examples provided, the song is 5 minutes and 30 seconds long, and you are 1 minute and 10 seconds into the song.

SongVolume.Name: バッキングトラックのボリューム
SongVolume.Description: Adjusts the song's backing track volume. These are all of the instruments that are not included in the multi-track.

StageKitEnabled.Name: ステージキットをオンにする
StageKitEnabled.Description: Enables sending Stage Kit lighting data to all connected devices capable of reading it.

StarPowerHighwayFx.Name: スターパワーのハイウェイエフェクトモード
StarPowerHighwayFx.Description: Disables visual elements on the highway which appear when Star Power is active.

SongBackgroundOpacity.Name: Song Background Opacity
SongBackgroundOpacity.Description: Adjusts the opacity of background during gameplay.

UseChipmunkSpeed.Name: ナイトコアモード
UseChipmunkSpeed.Description: Disables pitch correction when playing songs at a fast or slow speed which may lead to some... interesting results.

UseFullDirectoryForPlaylists.Name: Use Full Directory For Playlists
UseFullDirectoryForPlaylists.Description: Use full directory for the playlist sort option in the music library. <color=white>Rescan required if changed!</color>

UseStarpowerFx.Name: スターパワーSEを使います
UseStarpowerFx.Description: If enabled, it will add reverb to stems where the player has Star Power enabled.

Dropdown.MultitrackOnly: 高別のトラックがある曲のみで

UseCrowdFx.Name: 観客SEを使います
UseCrowdFx.Description:
If enabled, crowd sounds will be played.
If set to Starpower Claps Only, crowd sounds will only be played during Starpower.

Dropdown.StarpowerClapsOnly: スターパワークラップのみ

UseWhammyFx.Name: ワーミーSEを使います
UseWhammyFx.Description:
If enabled, it will add pitch bending to guitar stems when the player presses the whammy bar.
WARNING: This setting is known to cause audio desync issues on some machines.

VenueFpsCap.Name: ベニューフレームレート制限
VenueFpsCap.Description: ベニュー背景のフレームレート制限。GPU負荷を下げるのためにこれを下げます。

WhammyPitchShiftAmount.Name: Whammy Pitch Shift Amount
WhammyPitchShiftAmount.Description: Number of semitones the pitch is changed when the whammy bar is fully pressed. Larger amounts result in lower pitches; default is "1".

VenueAntiAliasing.Name: ベニューアンチエイジング
VenueAntiAliasing.Description: ベニュー背景のアンチエイジング方法。

VenuePostProcessing.Name: ベニューポストプロセッシング
VenuePostProcessing.Description: Determines if post-processing effects are applied to venue backgrounds.

VenueRenderingQuality.Name: Venue Rendering Quality
VenueRenderingQuality.Description: The quality/resolution to use for venue backgrounds.

Dropdown.UltraPerformance: ウルトラパフォーマンス

VideoCalibration.Name: Video Calibration (ms)
VideoCalibration.Description: Video calibration in milliseconds. Use the calibrator to automatically calibrate. This accounts for delays between the game's processing and the actual frame being displayed.

VocalMonitoring.Name: ボーカルモニタリング出力ボリューム
VocalMonitoring.Description: Adjusts the feedback you hear when singing.

VocalStreakFrequency.Name: ボーカルコンボの頻度
VocalStreakFrequency.Description: Sets the frequency of phrase streak notifications for vocalists.

VocalsVolume.Name: ボーカルの音量
VocalsVolume.Description: 曲のボーカルトラックのボリュームを変更します。この設定は高別のトラックがある曲のみで使えます。

VoiceActivatedVocalStarPower.Name: 声で発動するスターパワー（ボーカル）
VoiceActivatedVocalStarPower.Description: If enabled, vocalists can activate their Star Power by making a noise. Keybinds can be used instead, regardless of this setting.

VSync.Name: VSyncをオンにします
VSync.Description: Enables VSync. VSync caps the framerate at your monitor's maximum framerate, and prevents tearing.

PauseOnDeviceDisconnect.Name: Pause On Device Disconnect
PauseOnDeviceDisconnect.Description: Pauses the game if a device taken by a profile disconnects in the middle of a song.

PauseOnFocusLoss.Name: Pause On Focus Loss
PauseOnFocusLoss.Description: Pauses the game if it tabbed out/loses focus in the middle of a song.

ApplyVolumesInMusicLibrary.Name: Apply Volume Settings to Music Library Previews
ApplyVolumesInMusicLibrary.Description: Volume settings for specific instrumments will be applied in the Music Library as well.

DataStreamEnable.Name: UDPデータストリームをオンにする
DataStreamEnable.Description: Enables sending of UDP information packets over the network, for software such as YALCY.

RB3EEnabled.Name: RB3Eステージキットをオンにする
RB3EEnabled.Description: Enables sending of RB3E style stage kit information packets over the network, for hardware such as StageKitPied.

RB3EBroadcastIP.Name: RB3EターゲットIP
RB3EBroadcastIP.Description: Sets the target IP for the RB3E data stream packets. 255.255.255.255 is the broadcast address for the current network.

DMXKeyframeChannel.Name: DMXキーフレーム
DMXKeyframeChannel.Description: This channel receives the Next (3), Previous (13), and First (23) keyframe calls.

DMXBonusEffectChannel.Name: DMXボナスエフェクト
DMXBonusEffectChannel.Description: This channel gets set (2) when a venue bonus effect happens.

DMXDrumsChannel.Name: DMXドラム
DMXDrumsChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current drum notes: Kick (1), Red (2), Yellow (4), Blue (8), Green (16),  Yellow Cymbal (32), Blue Cymbal (64), Green Cymbal (128).

DMXBeatlineChannel.Name: DMXビートライン
DMXBeatlineChannel.Description: This channel gets set on every measure beat (1) and Strong beat (11).

DMXPostProcessingChannel.Name: DMXポストプロセス
DMXPostProcessingChannel.Description: This channel gets set to the video effect happening to the in-game venue. See the values below:

DMXGuitarChannel.Name: DMXギター
DMXGuitarChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current guitar notes: Open (1), Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

DMXBassChannel.Name: DMXベース
DMXBassChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current bass notes: Open (1), Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

DMXPerformerChannel.Name: DMX演奏者
DMXPerformerChannel.Description: This channel gets set to the current spotlight and sing-a-long.

DMXKeysChannel.Name: DMXキー
DMXKeysChannel.Description: This channel gets additively set to the current key notes: Green (2), Red (4), Yellow (8), Blue (16), Orange (32).

EnablePlaybackBuffer.Name: Use Audio Playback Buffer
EnablePlaybackBuffer.Description: Buffers audio data by decoding ahead-of-time in chunks. Improves audio stability on low-performance devices, at the cost of added latency on sound effects.

PlaybackBufferLength.Name: Playback Buffer Length
PlaybackBufferLength.Description: The size of the playback buffer, in milliseconds. Larger buffers provide more stability, but further increase the latency of sound effects.

ShowTime.Name: 時間を表示
ShowTime.Description: Show current time on Status Bar.

ShowBattery.Name: バッテリーを表示
ShowBattery.Description: ステータスバーでバッテリーレベルを表示する（バッテリーが放電するときに）。

MemoryStats.Name: メモリの統計を表示
MemoryStats.Description: ステータスバーでメモリ負荷情報を表示します。

ShowActivePlayers.Name: 改善のプレイヤーを表示
ShowActivePlayers.Description: Show the active players on the Status Bar, excluding bots. For bands consisting of more than 3 players, this will show the number of players instead.

ShowActiveBots.Name: 改善のボットを表示
ShowActiveBots.Description: ステータスバーでボットの量を表示（ボットがあれば）。

DMXUniverseChannel.Name: DMX Broadcast Universe
DMXUniverseChannel.Description: This is the universe that YARG will send the sACN packet to. Default is "1". Maximum is "65535".

ReconnectProfiles.Name: Reconnect Profiles
ReconnectProfiles.Description: At startup, reconnect previously connected profiles.

AutoCreateProfiles.Name: Create Profiles Automatically
AutoCreateProfiles.Description: Automatically create profile for any newly connected plastic band devices.

DMXDimmerValues.Name: DMX Master Dimmer Values
DMXDimmerValues.Description: These are the respective values that the Master Dimmer channels will be set to when YARG starts.

UpcomingLyricsTime.Name: Upcoming Lyrics Lead Time
UpcomingLyricsTime.Description: The time in seconds prior to an upcoming lyric that it will appear on screen. Upcoming lyrics will always appear if the time between the current and upcoming lyrics is smaller than this value.

WaitForSongVideo.Name: Wait For Song Videos When Seeking
WaitForSongVideo.Description: Waits for a song-specific video background to finish seeking when restarting/changing sections in practice or seeking a replay.

WrapAroundNavigation.Name: Wrap-Around Navigation
WrapAroundNavigation.Description: Allow menus to jump to the bottom of a list when scrolling past the top, or jump to the top of a list when scrolling past the bottom.

ReduceNoteSpeedByDifficulty.Name: 難易度でノーツスピードを落とす
ReduceNoteSpeedByDifficulty.Description: Reduces the note speed if playing on a lower difficulty than Expert. The specified note speed is applied to Expert, and lower difficulties receive a reduction in speed. This setting does not affect vocal tracks.

LearningGuides.Name: Learning Guides
LearningGuides.Description: Adds some musical theory guides for Pro Keys to help learn the instrument.

ShowPlayerNameWhenStartingSong.Name: 曲が始まる時にプレイヤー名を表示する
ShowPlayerNameWhenStartingSong.Description: 有効すると、曲が始まる時にプレイヤーの名と楽器アイコンが表示されます。

StaticVocalsMode.Name: Static Vocals Mode
StaticVocalsMode.Description: When enabled, lyrics stay stationary on the left side of the vocal highway. When disabled, lyrics scroll across the vocal highway.

UseThreeLaneLyricsInHarmony.Name: Use Three Lyric Lanes In Harmony
UseThreeLaneLyricsInHarmony.Description: If enabled, the game will display three lyric lanes in harmony mode (one for each harmony). When disabled, the game will combine the lyrics of harmonies 2 and 3 into one lane at the top.

EnableTrackEffects.Name: トラックエフェクトをオンにする
EnableTrackEffects.Description: If enabled, the game will display track effects for unison, solo, and drum SP activation phrases.

EnableHighwayAnimation.Name: ハイウェイアニメーションをオンにする
EnableHighwayAnimation.Description: If enabled, the highway will animate at the beginning and end of the song and based on performance.

EnableVoxSamples.Name: Enable Vox Samples
EnableVoxSamples.Description: If enabled, the game might make some noises at you on the score screen.

EnableNormalization.Name: Normalize Audio
EnableNormalization.Description: If enabled, normalizes audio so that all songs are approximately the same volume.  Increases memory and performance requirements.

PresetType.RockMeterPresetContainer: ロックミータープリセット

FadeLength.Name: フェードサイズ
FadeLength.Description: The track's fade size. A fade size of "0" will remove the fade.

FadeStart.Name: Fade Position
FadeStart.Description: The track's fade position. Lower values are closer to the frets. This also controls the track length.

FieldOfView.Name: カメラ視野角
FieldOfView.Description: トラックカメラの視野角です。

PositionY.Name: Camera Y Position
PositionY.Description: The track camera's Y position (up and down).

PositionZ.Name: Camera Z Position
PositionZ.Description: The track camera's Z position (forward and backwards).

Rotation.Name: カメラの回転
Rotation.Description: The track camera's rotational pitch (up and down).

OpenNoteStarPower.Name: 開放弦スターパワーノーツ

OpenParticles.Name: オープンのパーティクルエフェクト

OrangeActivationNote.Name: オレンジノーツスターパワー発動

OrangeParticles.Name: オレンジのパーティクルエフェクト

OrangeStarpower.Name: オレンジスターパワー

Red Cymbal Fret Inner

RedCymbalStarpower.Name: 赤いシンバルスターパワー

RedCymbalActivationNote.Name: 赤いシンバルスターパワー発動

RedDrumStarpower.Name: 赤いドラムスターパワー

RedPadActivationNote.Name: 赤いドラムスターパワー発動

RedFretInner.Name: 赤いフレットインナー

RedActivationNote.Name: 赤いノーツスターパワー発動

RedParticles.Name: レッドパーティクルエフェクト

YellowCymbalFretInner.Name:
Yellow Cymbal Fret Inner

YellowCymbalStarpower.Name: イエロシンバルスターパワー

YellowCymbalActivationNote.Name: イエロシンバルスターパワー発動

YellowDrumStarpower.Name: イエロドラムスターパワー

YellowPadActivationNote.Name: イエロドラムスターパワー発動

YellowFretInner.Name: イエロフレットインナー

YellowNoteStarPower.Name: 黄色ノーツスターパワー

YellowActivationNote.Name: 黄色ノーツスターパワー発動

YellowParticles.Name: イエロのパーティクルエフェクト

OrangeOverlay.Name: オレンジオーバーレイ

WhiteNoteStarPower.Name: ホワイトノーツスターパワー

BlackNoteStarPower.Name: ブラックノーツスターパワー

AntiGhosting.Name: アンチーゴスト
AntiGhosting.Description: Upon ghosting (or fretting a note that is not present) the player will drop their combo (guitar only).

FrontToBackRatio.Name: Hit Window Ratio
FrontToBackRatio.Description: The hit window's front to back ratio. "0" will bring the hit window fully backwards, "1" will keep it in the center, and "2" will move it to the front.

HitPercentE.Name: ヒット割合（EASY)
HitPercentE.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Easy difficulty.

HitPercentH.Name: ヒット割合（HARD)
HitPercentH.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Hard difficulty.

HitPercentM.Name: ヒット割合（MEDIUM)
HitPercentM.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Medium difficulty.

HitPercentX.Name: ヒット割合（EXPERT)
HitPercentX.Description: This determines how much of the phrase has to be accurately sung in order to fully fill the accuracy meter, in the Expert difficulty.

HitWindow.Name: 判定線
HitWindow.Description: The size of the hit window, in milliseconds. Higher values allow notes to be hit earlier/later, smaller values require more precise timing.

HopoLeniency.Name: HOPO Leniency
HopoLeniency.Description: The amount of time a hopo is allowed to take a strum input. Strum after this time and it will overstrum.

InfiniteFrontEnd.Name: Infinite Front End
InfiniteFrontEnd.Description: If on, HOPOs and taps can be fretted before they enter to hit window (guitar only).

IsDynamic.Name: Dynamic Hit Window
IsDynamic.Description: The timing window adjusts in size depending on how close together the notes are. The faster the notes are, the smaller the window becomes (guitar only).

StrumLeniency.Name: Strum Leniency
StrumLeniency.Description: The amount of time a strum can be inputted before fretting the correct note. Fretting after this time will overstrum.

StrumLeniencySmall.Name: Strum Leniency (No Notes)
StrumLeniencySmall.Description: The amount of time a note can be strummed before it enters the hit window and it still receive the strum. Strumming earlier than this will cause an overstrum.

PitchWindowE.Name: ウィンドウサイズ（EASY)
PitchWindowE.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Easy difficulty.

PitchWindowH.Name: ウィンドウサイズ（HARD)
PitchWindowH.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Hard difficulty.

PitchWindowM.Name: ウィンドウサイズ（MEDIUM)
PitchWindowM.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Medium difficulty.

PitchWindowX.Name: ウィンドウサイズ（EXPERT)
PitchWindowX.Description: Size of the pitch leniency window (in semitones); in other words, how off-pitch the player can sing, and the game will still detect as a correct note, in the Expert difficulty.

DynamicScale.Name: Dynamic Window Scale
DynamicScale.Description: The factor used to scale the distance between the notes before the dynamic hit window size is calculated.

DynamicSlope.Name: Dynamic Window Slope
DynamicSlope.Description: Affects how fast the dynamic hit window itself shrinks.

DynamicGamma.Name: Dynamic Window Gamma
DynamicGamma.Description: Biases the dynamic hit window one way or another. Values below 1 gives, on average, a looser window.

SoloTaps.Name: ソロ中タップを許します
SoloTaps.Description: Allows solo buttons to tap notes during solos

NoStarPowerOverlap.Name: No Star Power Overlap
NoStarPowerOverlap.Description: Disallows earning more Star Power while Star Power is already active.

BackgroundGrooveBaseColor3.Name: 未使用のグルーブの色

BackgroundImage.Name: カスタム背景テクスチャ

SideImage.Name: カスタムサイドテクスチャ（スターパワーでハイライトしました）

StartingHappiness.Name: Starting Happiness
StartingHappiness.Description: This controls how full the Rock Meter is at the beginning of the song.

MissDamageMultiplier.Name: Miss Damage Multiplier
MissDamageMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter decreases when missing a note. Higher values make the game more difficult.

OverhitDamageMultiplier.Name: Overhit Damage Multiplier
OverhitDamageMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter decreases when over-strumming. Higher values make the game more difficult.

HitRecoveryMultiplier.Name: Hit Recovery Multiplier
HitRecoveryMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter recovers when hitting a note correctly. Higher values make the game easier.

StarPowerEffectMultiplier.Name: Star Power Multiplier
StarPowerEffectMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter recovers when successfully hitting a note while Star Power is active. This has no effect on misses or overhits.

VocalsMissDamageMultiplier.Name: Miss Damage Multiplier (Vocals)
VocalsMissDamageMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter decreases when a vocalist sings a phrase poorly. Higher values make the game more difficult.

VocalsHitRecoveryMultiplier.Name: Hit Recovery Multiplier (Vocals)
VocalsHitRecoveryMultiplier.Description: This controls how much the Rock Meter recovers when a vocalist sings a phrase well. Higher values make the game easier.
